@kmcsharry I'm actually kind of excited. I have a plan for starting which looks manageable so fingers crossed.
PS I'm reliably informed that this is the most fun running event as it goes through the city and has loads of live music along the way.
I would LOVE if there was a gang of beginners at the starting line in August, and to have people to chat to about training. Join me?
However, I'm excited to prove to myself that I'm capable of it, and to show that running is for people of all shapes and sizes.
As a non-runner/non-athlete/non-getter-off-the-coucher, it's a big step outside my comfort zone to have committed to running 10k in public.
